Ĩdé rewardari sinimuka'etá ramẽ, ĩdé reyaré [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use puruçawa rekô'etá] açui umukatiuru uyuyuriĩma ne pitimũgawa [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ mutarawa rupí CC-BY-SA 4.0] açui [https://www.gnu.org/copyleft/fdl.html mutarawa GFDL].
